title: Full Moon Squeaky Toy
summaries: The Full Moon Squeaky Toy is a Hardmode pet-summoning item that spawns a Baby Werewolf pet to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, the Baby Werewolf flies after them by flapping its arms, mimicking a bird-like creature. The Full Moon Squeaky Toy can be purchased from the Zoologist during a Hardmode Blood Moon for 30 GC.

statistics.Buy: 30 GC
statistics.Sell: 6 GC
